Title: Suna no Wakusei feat. Hatsune Miku
Description: ["Music video for Kenshi Yonezu's song ", Suna no Wakusei feat. Hatsune Miku, ' animated by Minakata Laboratory. The video was also included on the "Hatsune Miku Magical Mirai 2017" album.']
